message.body: You weren't doing anything for your bday tonight, were you? Cause I have to help my dad fix my bathroom ceiling (finally!!!) tonight.
Nope. My birthday has come and gone.
Oh! That has been a long time for that ceiling. And winter's coming.
But not forgotten! Least by me! I'll take you for a bday dinner....or lunch. Breakfast. Brunch. Mid morning snack. What ever you want.
He started making a plan to do it when he heard that this winter was going to be as bad as the last one.
Haha. Ok. And yeah! I heard that too. I really can't do it again. I hope it's not true.
Oh. Since I wasn't included in that group text. Was Sam or Phuong able to do anything tonight? I don't want to wait for an answer from Michael when he gets in late tonight. Haha.
Phuong said yes but Sammy didn't answer.
Hahaha. That is so true. I hate when I eat a bag of chips and I'm like, let me eat an apple to cleanse my palate. Like that negates all the crap I just consumed. Haha.
